Notes: A spawner that creates rolling boulders. The boulders can be destroyed by attacking the red crystal part, however, fireballs don't work. When using the Rock or Rainbow power-ups, the player doesn't have to attack the crystal specifically.

Obj_arg0.Name: Rolling Speed
Obj_arg0.Description: The rate at which the boulders roll. Default is 10.

Obj_arg1.Name: Spawn Delay
Obj_arg1.Description: The delay in seconds between the spawns. If non-positive, only one boulder will spawn. Default is -1.

Obj_arg2.Name: Break at Last Point?
Obj_arg2.Description: If set, the boulder will break once it reaches the last path point.

Obj_arg3.Name: Path Roll Time
Obj_arg3.Description: The time in frames that it rolls on the path before falling down. Default is 45.

Obj_arg4.Name: Shadow Length
Obj_arg4.Description: Sets the shadow drop length. Default is 1000.

Obj_arg5.Name: Decelerate When Attacked?
Obj_arg5.Description: If set, the rock will decelerate and accelerate again when it successfully damaged an object, such as the player.

Point_arg0.Name: Fall Type
Point_arg0.Description: Specifies how the boulder rolls at this point.

Point_arg1.Name: Path Movement Type
Point_arg1.Description: Specifies how the movement is affected by the path.

Values.Notes: Moves along path starting from this point

Point_arg2.Name: Follow Tangent?
Point_arg2.Description: If set, the boulder will follow the path's tangent until this point has been reached.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The boulders will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_A.Description: Stops spawning more boulders once activated.

Rail.Description: The path that the boulders roll on.
